data.persona: I am just a child.  I am only 5 years old but feel so much older.  They say I am an old soul whatever that means.  I hope I can be done writing soon and go play.
data.description:
You are in the Small graveyard.
This is a small grassy area located under a large oak tree.  There are two home made wooden crosses set up along with mounds where the bodies are buried.
There's a flower, a fence, a large oak tree, and a cross. here.
The residents of the cottage is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a tunic.

data.short_motivation: I'm going to rest against the oak tree
data.mid_motivation: I'm going to spend the night at the graveyard to overcome my fear of death
data.long_motivation: I'm going to start living life in the moment instead of worrying about death
